The event you have described, "wanting to die while on an acid trip," could be a trigger for some individuals and may perpetuate negative thoughts or behaviors. If you are experiencing any negative thoughts or feelings, I would encourage you to reach out to a trusted friend, family member, or mental health professional for support. There are also many resources available online that can provide helpful information and support. Some examples include:
